title: Overcoming Cognitive Barriers via Project-Based Learning in Mechanical Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic engineering concepts and ability to interpret simple technical drawings
context.additional_context: Project execution using real-time collaboration tools in an individual BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Identify and explain the four major cognitive barriers encountered during design projects: lack of design language, insufficient idea repertoire, limited imagination, and fixation.
Apply at least three strategies to minimize cognitive barriers in design problem-solving processes through online collaboration with team members.
Complete weekly design projects and submit final deliverables (3D modeling or sketches) after incorporating feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
